utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, now this one is rare, this one is medium well! Now go-go-go! Hey Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey how was dinner?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Dinner was good!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m just saying hi! Now I’m gonna go!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well hello there.

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I didn’t see this on the menu.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh Tim? This is Phoebe. Phoebe this is Tim, my new sous chef.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, so you're Monica’s boss?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Actually she’s my-my boss. Sous is French for under.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! I sous stand.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Tim? I need a calamari and a Caesar salad. And umm, could you get me the pesto?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh you…you made pesto?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Yes I did.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Would you say your pesto is the best-o?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: I…I-I don’t know, but I would say it’s pretty good-o.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I still need a calamari and a Caesar salad.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: I like your necklace.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I made it myself.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: You are so talented.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it’s no pesto.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: Wow Bing! Burning the midnight oil.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know me sir. Oh ah, I do have a question for ya. Do you know how I get around the office computer network so I can access the really good Internet porn?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: You’re a joker Bing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’s funny about that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Sorry I kept you waiting so long.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey that’s okay. So, where do you want to go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh ah, I think you know where I want to go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The Hard Rock Café?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Again?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m telling you, I like the food!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You like the Purple Rain display! Hey Bob.

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Hey Toby! Have a good night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did that guy just call you Toby?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, he thinks that’s my name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, why don’t you correct him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh it’s been going on way to long now. Y’know, I mean the first time he said it we were just passing each other in the hallway, so I didn’t say anything. And then the next time he said, "Hey Toby, do you want a donut?" And I-I wanted a donut. And now it’s five years later, the donut’s gone and I’m still Toby.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Five years?! Chandler you have to tell him!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! That would be so awkward! Look—Besides, we work in different departments. He’s on the sixth floor y’know? So he calls me Toby once in a while. What’s the big deal? It could be worse, it’s not like he’s calling me Muriel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Muriel. Wh-why would he call you Muriel? Oh my God! Chandler M Bing? It’s not just an M, your middle name is Muriel!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Shh! It is a family name!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler Muriel Bing. Boy, your parents never gave you a chance did they?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Drake Ramoray
utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Drake Ramoray
utterance.content: Is it serious?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Drake Ramoray
utterance.content: Well that sounds simple enough, let’s just do that.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Cut! Very nice people!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, let me just get changed and we can go to dinner.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well don’t—What happened to Jessica’s body?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m not telling, you’ll have to see it on TV!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You don’t know do you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, couldn’t care less.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey you too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? You weren’t in it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh sorry. Uh-uh, Kash?

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Yes?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is my friend Rachel. Rachel, Kash, Kash, Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Hey! How come I haven’t seen you here before?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, Joey probably thinks I’ll just embarrass him. Y’know, he thinks I’m some kind of a soap opera nut—Which I’m not! I’m not. Although I do know that your uh, your favorite ice cream flavor is butter pecan. And uh, and that your-your dog’s name is Wally. Well look at that, I’m just stroking your arm.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Here we go! Here we go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, we’re leaving. Bye Kash.

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Say hi to Wally.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! I had the best time with Tim last night. He is so sweet! Oh, I can’t wait to get sous-neath him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I…I have to fire him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But why?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because he’s terrible! Okay, he’s slow, he burns things, last night he lit my pastry chef on fire!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well maybe he was just nervous, y’know you can be very intimidating. And besides I’ve met your pastry chef and she can stand to be taken down a peg or two.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, now she has no eyebrows, mission accomplished.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But Monica, he loves his job so much! Can you just give him another chance? Please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, but if-if he lights someone else on fire he is out of there!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s fair! Thank you so much. Thanks. Oops, it looks like when he got the pastry chef he got you a little bit too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I paid to have this done.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Love it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh you know uh Kash, really liked you the other day. He said he thought you were charming.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I thought I was a complete idiot.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I’m with you. He even asked me if I thought you’d go out with him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Oh, I think I’m gonna throw up a little bit. What did you say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I said no.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? I…I just figured since you’re pregnant you’re not gonna be seeing people.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay Joey, first of all Kash Ford is not people. Second of all, what did he say when you told him I was pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I didn’t tell him. I didn’t know if you were telling people. This is back when I thought Kash was still people.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good-good, don’t tell him. Don’t tell him. Just have him call me okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach look, I really don’t think that’s such a great…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, you go do it! I’ll come back to that set! I’ll meet more actors! I’ll meet ‘em all!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Bob.

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Hey! How’s my pal Toby doing today?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If I see him, I’ll ask.

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Toby!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: Hey-hey! Bing? Was that Bob from six you were just talking too?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: Oh then you know each other.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We’re on a semi-first name basis.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: What do you think of adding him to our team?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bob? Ooh, working here with us? Everyday? Yeah, I don’t know if he has what it takes.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: Really? They love him down on six.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But this is eleven. It’s almost twice as hard up here.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: Okay, I hear you loud and clear. Bob will stay put.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think it’s best sir.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: But we really do need to find someone up here. The work is starting to pile up. I’ve got a stack of documents on my desk this high.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what you should do, just toss ‘em in the shedder and claim you never got ‘em.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Franklin
utterance.content: That’s a good one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What does a guy have to do to be taken seriously around here?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey. Okay, I gave him another chance, but Tim has got to go!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! No-no! He is totally incompetent. I called the chef who recommended him to me. He said, "Ha-ha! Gotcha!"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, but you can’t fire him today.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why not?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because I’m dumping him today.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! You said he was sweet!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He is sweet. He’s too sweet. He calls me all the time. "So did-did you get home from work okay?" "Did-did you get out of the shower okay?"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Just don’t pick up your phone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then he comes over! "I’m so worried about you." Uck! Be a man!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? So now I’m not allowed to fire him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You can’t fire him and dump him the same day, he’ll kill himself.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay well then, I’ll fire him today and you go out with him for another week.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you kidding?! Another week with that sip, I’ll kill myself!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay well, then we’ll both do it today and he’ll just have to deal with it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. But the question is who’s gonna go first. ‘Cause whoever goes second is the bitch.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on! The boss that fires a guy that’s just been dumped, bitch! And the woman who dumps a guy that’s just been fired, blond bitch!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wanted to do this days ago so I think I should go first.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, that makes sense. Ugh. But—Screw you I’m going first!

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Hey Toby, you got a sec?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure, what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: I just had a meeting, I was actually hoping to get transferred up here, but I just found out its not gonna happen. Apparently somebody thinks I’m not eleventh floor material. Say uh, who the hell is this Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, what do you think is a better excuse for why I’m not drinking on this date tonight. "Umm, I’m a recovering alcoholic. I’m a Mormon," or "I got so hammered last night I’m still a little drunk?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, what do you want to do tonight? There’s a Ukrainian film at the Angelica that’s supposed to be very powerful. Interested?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. No. But I’ll go see a normal person movie with ya.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach? You wanna come?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, I can’t. I got a date.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A date?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Why? Is that weird for you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why no, it’s the opposite of weird. It’s-it’s uh, regular. It’s-it’s uh, it’s mundane. It’s actually uh, a little dull.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s no Ukrainian film.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah—Ooh! Earrings!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A date?! She’s-she’s got a date?! With who?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I set her up with this actor on my show.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You set her up?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey what-what were you thinking?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I was thinking that it’d probably be okay because Ross hasn’t gone out with Rachel in five years!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, I’m not worried about her! I’m worried about my baby! Whoever she dates my baby dates! Now-now where is this actor taking them?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! I’m an actor too! I’m not sure. I think they’re taking the ferry out to some Italian place on Staten Island.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A ferry? My baby is going on a ferry? Do you have any idea how dangerous those are?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are we talking about one of those big boats that carry cars that go like five miles an hour?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why don’t they just jump out of an airplane?! Huh?! That-that’s a fun date! Or burn each other with matches?! That’s fun too! Whew!!

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Hey Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Kash. Uh hey-hey this is Ross. Ross, this is Kash.

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi. I-I hear you’re going on a ferry tonight.

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A bit of a daredevil are we?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey guys do you think this is too slutty—Hi Kash!

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Hey Rachel! You ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! All right, I’ll see you guys later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Have a great time you guys.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Kash
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes it is too slutty!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Oh, I’m so glad you called. I feel like it’s always me calling you. So, what’s up? Is everything okay with Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It will be…in a minute. Listen, Tim you’re a really great guy.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: It’s because I’m with you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Aw. I’m just—I’m in a place in my life right now where I…I…

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Whoops. Sorry. This just in. Oh, it’s 9-1-1 from the restaurant, that means Monica needs me right away.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh-oh no she doesn’t! I know what that is. You can stay.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Awww, I’ll miss you too Pheebs. And I will be holding you, right here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what movie do you want to see—And not another one I have to read. Okay? I get enough of that from books.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Books?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, car magazines, cereal boxes, but it’s like enough!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I tell you what. Why don’t we uh, why don’t we just stay here? Let’s not see a movie, we’ll just hang.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And just wait for Rachel to come back from her date?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, if that’s what you want to do I’m not gonna say no.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude! What is going on?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just…I have to find out how it went.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This guy could be my baby’s stepfather!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They go on one date and you’re worried about them getting married?! He’s not you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just—I-I can’t believe she’s-she’s dating?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well Ross, what did you think she was gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know! I guess I just can’t believe any of this is happening.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s just I always thought when I had another kid it would be different. Now I-I love Ben, but every time I have to drop him off at Carol and Susan’s, it’s like—It breaks my heart a little. I mean I’ve always had this picture of me and my next wife in bed on Sunday and, my kid comes running in and leaps up onto the bed. And we all read the paper together. Y’know? Maybe fight over the science section.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s a nice picture. Maybe you can still have that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No I can’t. I mean Rachel’s out with some guy. My baby went with her. If anything that picture keeps moving further away.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, can I ask you something? In this, in this picture of you and your wife, is your wife Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It used to be. Now she doesn’t really have a face. Smokin’ body though.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good call. Yeah. But, the face Ross, the face isn’t Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No but ahh! How much easier would it be if it were?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, but I don’t think that’s what she wants.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, it’s not what I want either. I mean I-I can’t force myself to fall in love with her again now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s okay Ross maybe you need a new picture. Okay? It’s not gonna be what you thought, but no matter what there’s gonna be a brand new little baby, your baby. Who cares what the picture looks like?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I tell you what. Let’s you and me go out and have some fun. Huh? Whatever you want. Come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We can still catch that Ukrainian film.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I said fun!

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Hey Toby!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Bobby.

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: It’s Bob actually. Hey, you work up here, can you tell me where this Chandler Bing’s office is?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh yeah. Yeah, it’s right, right down there. Right there, yeah. Can I ask you why?

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: I want to talk to that bastard, see what his problem is.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay Bob listen uhh, I’m the reason you didn’t get the job up here.

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Toby don’t.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bob!

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Toby! I’m not gonna let you cover for him. Anything you say right now will just get me more upset with Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well that puts me in a difficult position.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: I got your page, is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh well that depends, how are things with Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Oh it’s great! It’s great! Thank you so much for introducing us!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my pleasure. Okay, I’m afraid I’ve got some bad news. Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re fired!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m breaking up with you!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m, I’m breaking up with you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re fired.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m sorry, I’m just—I’m…I’m just not ready for a relationship right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah and-and I’m sorry too. But, well I just—I like things done a certain way and the chemistry’s just not right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh that’s good, the chemistry thing for us too.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Wow! Umm, okay. Umm… I-I-I realize I came on a little strong but, it’s only because I think you’re so amazing. And uh, I-I just wanna, I just wanna tell you how much I appreciate you giving me an opportunity here because I—you’re the most talented chef I’ve ever worked for. Anyway…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Tim wait!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, I think I spoke too quickly. There-there’s a learning curve with this job and maybe we can try it again.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Thank you so much! ‘Cause I-I know I can do better!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And Tim I just wanna say, good luck here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, how was the date?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well I’m alone and I just bought fifteen dollars worth of candy bars, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh. What happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I made the mistake of telling him that I was pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, he didn’t uh, take it so well?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well better than you, but y’know still not what you want.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He got all weird and sputtery and then he said uh, "Yeah, I hear those hemorrhoids are a bitch."

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He sounds swell.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Doesn’t he?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, wanna…wanna a little cheering up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sit down.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Guess whose middle name is Muriel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler M. Bing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah-ha!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry about your date.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh it’s all right. I’m guess I’m just done with the whole dating thing. It’s one more thing in my life that’s suddenly completely different. This is hard.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah I know. On the other hand in um, in about seven months you’re gonna have something that you’re gonna love more than any guy you’ve ever gone out with. Just wait. Wait until uh, wait until the first time your baby grabs your finger. You have no idea.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You wanna, you wanna grab some coffee?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, I think I’m gonna go home and eat ten candy bars.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I thought I cheered you up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh you did, there are twenty in here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right. Good night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good night.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Hey it’s Mona! From the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hi!

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! Uh…how are you?

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: I’m good except umm, you still owe me a dance.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh that’s right. Well uh, would you be interested in seeing a Ukrainian film?

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Oh you’re serious. Sure!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great! Well umm…

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: I think I might need one more cup of coffee.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure! Uh, let me get it for ya.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bob. Bob! Bob!!! What the hell are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: I just found out this is Chandler’s office! Come on Toby, give me a hand!
